treatment.description: Plants 60–120 cm. Leaves cau-line; sessile; blades oblong-ovate to elliptic, 5–15 cm, bases cordate, clasping, auriculate, margins spinulose-denticulate, faces densely glandular-scabrid. Heads in paniculiform arrays. Involucres turbinate to campanulate, 6–8(–10+) mm. Phyllaries in 3–4 series, linear to oblanceolate, apices acute to acuminate or mucronate, margins and abaxial faces glandular-hairy. Receptacles alveolate, glandular-hairy. Florets 10–20; corollas lavender-pink, 6–12 mm. Cypselae cylindric, 1.5–6 mm, bristly glandular-puberulent; pappi tawny, 6–10 mm. 2n = 54.
